body_html: @nkhdiscovery Once we're done, the code will be compiled with -fvisibility=hidden, and only symbols marked with TF_EXPORT will be exported. Unfortunately I don't understand the details of versions scripts, so I don't know enough to answer what you can do that will be useful. Most of the work is restructuring the actual code to make it easy to restrict exports, not doing the actual export restriction.

body: @nkhdiscovery Once we're done, the code will be compiled with `-fvisibility=hidden`, and only symbols marked with `TF_EXPORT` will be exported.  Unfortunately I don't understand the details of versions scripts, so I don't know enough to answer what you can do that will be useful.  Most of the work is restructuring the actual code to make it easy to restrict exports, not doing the actual export restriction.
